summary: A balance patch for iNeed v1.602 and Requiem 2.0.1. Removes buffs, balances cheese wheels, and adds FISS support.
descriptionHtml:
A balance patch for iNeed v1.602 and Requiem 2.0.1.


Thank you isoku for iNeed! Get it here: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51473/?


Removes the buffs that iNeed gives when the player satisfies hunger/thirst (they still show in active effects):
 - Well Sated (health regeneration and damage output increased by 5%)
 - Well Hydrated (5% shout cooldown reduction, stamina and magicka regeneration increased by 5%)
 - Vaired Diet (+10 health)
 
Balances iNeed's feature of letting the player eat cheese wheels in portions:
 - Made the stats of different portions consistent
 - 8 portions total: wheel -> sliced wheel -> wedges

Also includes FISS support so you can save/load MCM settings.


Notes:
Not compatible with the new SSE iNeed. Only version 1.602.
Modifies two scripts, sources included.
I've only added Bottled Water to iNeed's inbuilt lists. More could be added, but iNeed's recognition system is already quite nice.


Load order:
iNeed.esp
Requiem.esp
Requiem - iNeed.esp
author: broccolu
